ext_description.p: The assigned_document_select specifies a Document, Document_version, Document_definition or a File which may be associated with product data.
The documented_element_select specifies an extensible select of elements to which documents can be assigned.
A Document_assignment is a mechanism to associate a document with an object, where the assigned document provides information about the object it is associated to.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The assigned_document specifies the Document, Document_version, Document_definition, or File that is used to provide information.
The is_assigned_to specifies the object that information is provided for.

ext_description.p: A Partial_document_assignment is a type of Document_assignment. A Partial_document_assignment identifies a specific portion of the contents of a document. It assigns this portion to the product data for which it is relevant.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The document_portion specifies the word or group of words that convey the subject or sub contents of the Document.
